title: Alewife Telemetry - Lake Ontario - Nowcast Temperatures
text:
Purpose
This site is designed to provide quick updates on projected water temperatures given current conditions from NOAA’s GLERL website for specific areas of Lake Ontario.
This site will automatically rebuild every 12 hr and will pull the latest projection.


Area of interest
Below is a interactive map with the area and corresponding ‘nodes’ or locations in relation to the projected data.








Predicted thermal profiles
Below are predicted thermal profiles for nodes 3383, 4512, and 5088 which are the center of the the array.

title: Home
text:
Purpose
This site is designed to provide quick updates on water temperatures from NOAA’s GLERL website for specific areas of Lake Ontario. Please click either Nowcast to see current projections for the past 12 hours and Forecast to next 72 hours.
Current conditions can also be obtained at the Ajax ECCC bouy for the near the Port Credit array.
Current conditions can also be obtained at the Grimbsy ECCC bouy for the Hamilton array.
Current conditions can be obtained at the Niagara on the lake ECCC Bouy for the Niagra array.
